InovAtiva.title: Gamest é reconhecida como Startup Destaque no programa InovAtiva Brasil
InovAtiva.text: O programa InovAtiva Brasil 2022.2 contou com o apoio do Ministério da Economia, Sebrae, Fundação CERTI, ABSTARTUPS, Impact Hub e diversos outros colaboradores do ecossistema de inovação e empreendedorismo. O programa promoveu oportunidades de aceleração de negócios inovadores, conexão com potenciais investidores e parceiros e capacitação empreendedora.

InovAtiva.title: Gamest is awarded as a Highlight Startup in the InovAtiva Brazil program
InovAtiva.text: The InovAtiva Brasil 2022.2 program was supported by the Ministry of Economy, Sebrae, CERTI Foundation, ABSTARTUPS, Impact Hub and several other collaborators in the innovation and entrepreneurship ecosystem. The program promoted opportunities for accelerating innovative businesses, connecting with potential investors and partners, and providing entrepreneurial training.
